mods.abstract: Female adult, composition head covered with fabric, wire support arms, molded and painted features, black wig, cloth body, traditional lady's hairstyle of Korea, flower decorated hair-dress, white under-pants, deep pink long skirt(Chi-ma), long sleeve Cho-go-ri(blouse) has several colors on sleeves, white long hand-cover, brown wide belt tied on back, all, machine-made. Accompanying information describes that the costume of the Korean dancer has very long sleeves. The hands are not shown. The long sleeves serve as flags or banners. Note the hair-dress.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
